content: The Pyramids of Giza were built as tombs for pharaohs during which ancient Egyptian period?

The Pyramids of Giza were built during the Old Kingdom period of ancient Egypt, specifically during the Fourth Dynasty, around 2580-2560 BCE. The most well-known pyramids at Giza were constructed for the pharaohs Khufu, Khafre, and Menkaure.
